resources.string: Are you sure you want to delete the sweet roll?
Sweet roll deletion will erase all of its demand entries!
Are you sure you want to delete demand?
Are you sure you want to delete all demand history of sweet roll?
All sweet roll demand entries will be deleted!
Sweet roll name can not be empty!
The value of money can not be empty!
Baking costs have to be lower than the price!
Baking costs have to be higher than the surplus price!
1. Is it possible to switch language to other language in this app?
2. Is it possible to restore the deleted sweet roll data?
3. Is it possible to change the sweet roll image?
5. What does the word "import" mean? Where will the data be imported?
6. How much sweet rolls can be added?
7. Where can I see the demand history?
8. Do I need to enter data every day?
9. Does the app require a regular Internet connection?
Yes, the language of the application will be the same as the device language when changing device settings in Latvian, English or Russian.

Yes, it is possible to restore data if they were previously exported. In this case, you must press the "import" button in the main menu. Data will be restored to the state in which they were exported.

Yes, it is possible by clicking on the button with pencil in the upper right corner and then clicking on the image that will allow you to select another or the same image from the available image library.

The data is exported to the file bulcina.db stored in the external storage directory. This is a directory that stores data that may need to be accessed by different applications and which will not be deleted if the app is deleted. This directory stores, for example, images and download files. External memory can be for example an SD card.

The data is imported from the file bulcina.db, which must be in the external storage directory. If the file is not in the directory, a failure-free import message is displayed. The import file is the same file that is created with the export function. To import data from one device to another, the user must move the file of the first device from the external memory directory to the corresponding directory on the other device.
Clicking on the sweet roll and then pressing the "view demand history" button.
Yes, it is advisable to enter accurate information everyday, what can be seen in monthly reports, and then algorithm can accurately calculate the amount of sweet rolls needed.
